Hello Project 2023 Summer City Circuit is now underway!
And Beyonce will be performing at Yokosuka Art Theater on August 13th!
We are looking forward to bringing you an even more powerful summer tour, so we hope you will come and enjoy it.
And we, Angelem, will be performing at the Rock in Japan Festival 202 3 on August 13th.

We are very excited to be the first performer on the glass stage, and it will be our first festival as a new group, so we will do our best.We are very excited to be the top performer on the Glass Stage, and this will be our first festival as a newly organized group, so we will do our best.
Next, we, Beyons, will perform at Tokyo Idol Festival 2023 on August 4th and 5th.
On August 4, we will be performing as a group called "Subway," "Rain Forest," "Kawao," and "Seasonings," and on August 5, we will be performing as Beyons.
On August 5th, we will be performing as the Beyons, and I think there are many colors that only each unit can bring out.
